alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 21 at 2:54AM MST until October 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts from 45 to 55 mph expected. Locally higher gusts are possible overnight Saturday through Sunday morning. * WHERE...The White Mountains and adjacent Little Colorado River Valley, and Chinle Valley. * WHEN...From noon Saturday to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
